alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:09AM PST until January 07 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON PST SUNDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of trace to 2 inches. Winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph with higher gusts to 65 mph on ridge tops and other exposed locations. * WHERE...San Bernardino, Riverside, and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight Saturday night to noon Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The strong winds could topple trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow level will fall rapidly Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
